page.title: 15WHAT WE DO OUT OF SCHOOL
page.content: Nearly everyone we talked to liked watching television.Some of them liked other things such as: RACHEL_ Swimming & judo. JULIE_ Swimming & cooking. HANNAH_ Swimming & dancing. CLARE_ Playing on friends computer. RUTH_ Playing on monkey swing. ESTELLE_ Riding her pony. MARIE_ Swimming. PAUL_ Moter bike scrambling. JEREMY_ Tennis & football. MATTHEW_ Flute. JOHN_ Playing outside. MATTHEW_ Video & atari. KEVIN_ Playing outside. Our teachers-Mrs.Parker_music,hockey, photography,'own children'.Mrs Moir _Travelling,cooking,gardening & books. Miss Hunter_Bell ringing,gardening, spinning,her dog & sewing. Mr.KENT-WOOLSEY-dogs,shooting,fishing.
